trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the category in which to group the property or event when displayed in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid"></xref> control set to Categorized mode.
trans-unit.target: 指定要在其中进行分组的属性或事件时显示在类别的名称<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid"></xref>控件设置为按分类顺序模式。

trans-unit.source: A CategoryAttribute indicates the category to associate the associated property or event with, when listing properties or events in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> control set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertySort> mode.
trans-unit.target: CategoryAttribute 表示要将关联的属性或事件，关联的类别列出的属性或事件中的时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>控件设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertySort>模式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertySort> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>

trans-unit.source: If a CategoryAttribute has not been applied to a property or event, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> associates it with the **Misc** category.
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未应用于属性或事件，CategoryAttribute<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>将其与关联**杂项**类别。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>

trans-unit.source: A new category can be created for any name by specifying the name of the category in the constructor for the CategoryAttribute.
trans-unit.target: 通过为 CategoryAttribute 构造函数中指定类别的名称，可以为任何名称创建新类别。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute.Category%2A> property indicates the name of the category that the attribute represents.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute.Category%2A>属性指示该属性表示的类别的名称。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute.Category%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute.Category%2A> property also provides transparent localization of category names.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute.Category%2A>属性还提供透明本地化的类别名称。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute.Category%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> class using the category name Default.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref>类使用的类别名称默认值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> class using the specified category name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref>类使用指定的类别名称。

trans-unit.source: If the name you provide for the `category` parameter is one of the predefined category names, the name will be automatically localized by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute.Category%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你为提供的名称`category`参数是一个预定义的类别名称，名称将自动按本地化<xref:System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute.Category%2A>属性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute.Category%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the name you provide is not a predefined category name, and you do not override the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute.GetLocalizedString%2A> method to provide a localized name, the category name will not be localized.
trans-unit.target: 如果你提供的名称不是预定义的类别名称，并且不是重写<xref:System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute.GetLocalizedString%2A>方法以提供具有本地化的名称，类别名称将不会本地化。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute.GetLocalizedString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the category.
Gets a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> representing the Action category.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> for the action category.
Gets a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> representing the Appearance category.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> for the appearance category.
Gets a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> representing the Asynchronous category.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> for the asynchronous category.
Gets a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> representing the Behavior category.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> for the behavior category.
Gets the name of the category for the property or event that this attribute is applied to.
trans-unit.target: 获取的属性或此特性应用于事件的类别的名称。

trans-unit.source: This property calls <xref:System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute.GetLocalizedString%2A> to get the localized name of the category the first time it is accessed.
trans-unit.target: 此属性调用<xref:System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute.GetLocalizedString%2A>来获取第一次访问它的类别的本地化的名称。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute.GetLocalizedString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the category for the property or event that this attribute is applied to.
trans-unit.target: 对属性或事件，此特性应用于类别的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> representing the Data category.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> for the data category.
Gets a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> representing the Default category.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> for the default category.
Gets a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> representing the Design category.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> for the design category.
Gets a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> representing the DragDrop category.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> for the drag-and-drop category.
Returns whether the value of the given object is equal to the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref>..
trans-unit.target: 返回给定对象的值是否等于当前<xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"> </xref>...

trans-unit.source: The object to test the value equality of.
trans-unit.target: 要测试的值相等性的对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value of the given object is equal to that of the current; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果给定的对象的值是否等于当前;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> representing the Focus category.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> for the focus category.
Gets a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> representing the Format category.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> for the format category.
Returns the hash code for this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 返回此属性的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 32 位有符号的整数哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Looks up the localized name of the specified category.
trans-unit.target: 查找指定的类别的本地化名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute.Category%2A> property calls this method the first time it is accessed to look up the localized name for the specified category.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute.Category%2A>属性调用此方法访问要查找指定的类别的本地化名称的第一个时间。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute.Category%2A>

trans-unit.source: The identifer for the category to look up.
trans-unit.target: 要查找的类别的的标识符。

trans-unit.source: The localized name of the category, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if a localized name does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 类别的本地化的名称或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果具有本地化的名称不存在。

trans-unit.source: Determines if this attribute is the default.
trans-unit.target: 确定此属性是否为默认值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the attribute is the default value for this attribute class; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果属性是为该属性类; 默认值否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> representing the Key category.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> for the key category.
Gets a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> representing the Layout category.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> for the layout category.
Gets a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> representing the Mouse category.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> for the mouse category.
Gets a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> representing the WindowStyle category.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref>表示 WindowStyle 类别。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref> for the window style category.
